category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAllowedChildTypes_ValidationReq
preference.preference_description: Defines the item types permitted in a validation requirement parent structure. This preference is valid only when the TCEnforceSingleType preference is set to false.Validation requirement objects are defined by the ValidationReq business object type. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values. Each string must be a valid Teamcenter business object internal name.
